Name: lymphoma
Definition: A hematologic cancer that affects lymphocytes that reside in the lymphatic system and in blood-forming organs.

Name: leukemia
Definition: A cancer that affects the blood or bone marrow characterized by an abnormal proliferation of blood cells.

Name: mast cell neoplasm
Definition: A hematologic cancer that has_material_basis_in mast cells.

Name: histiocytic and dendritic cell cancer
Definition: A sarcoma and hematologic cancer that derives_from follicular lymphoma.

Name: obsolete Major puerperal infectious disease
Definition: A sarcoma and hematologic cancer that derives_from follicular lymphoma.

Name: refractory hematologic cancer
Definition: A hematologic cancer that is located in the blood or bone marrow that doesn't respond to treatment.

Name: myeloid sarcoma
Definition: A sarcoma that has_material_basis in lymphatic tissue.
